name: chf
definition: Vznik otoků, transsudátů vede k obrazu tzv. městnavého (kongestivního) selhání srdce. (cit. Velký lékařský slovník online, 2017 http://lekarske.slovniky.cz)

name: contusion
definition: mechanical injury (usually caused by a blow) resulting in hemorrhage beneath unbroken skin; a bruise.

name: marker
definition: A visual indicator of position, place or route.

name: pectoralis
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: Velký a malý prsní sval tvoří přední horní část hrudníku před podpažní jamkou (AXILLA).

name: muscles
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: Nonparenchymatous organ that primarily consists of skeletal muscle tissue aggregated into macroscopic fasciculi by connective tissue; together with other muscles, it constitutes the muscular system. Examples: biceps, diaphragm, masseter, right third external intercostal muscle, external oblique, levator ani, serratus anterior.

name: tissues
definition: Organ part, which is uncountable and consists of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships; together with other tissues, it constitutes an organ component. Examples: epithelium, muscle (tissue), connective tissue, neural tissue, lymphoid tissue.

name: presumed
definition: Likely to be true; accepted as true.

name: manubrium
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: El segmento superior o más anterior del ESTERNÓN que se articula con la CLAVÍCULA y dos primeros pares de COSTILLAS.

name: bleed
definition: Bleeding or escape of blood from a vessel.

name: manubrial
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component

name: eventration
definition: A localized protrusion of a structure into an adjacent structure or cavity.

name: Dense
definition: Having high relative density or specific gravity; permitting little if any light to pass through.

name: pectoral
definition: Of or pertaining to the chest.

name: greater than
definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.

name: Widespread
definition: Spread throughout a structure or area.

name: improve
definition: Condition changed and/or recovered

name: deteriorated
definition: In an declined condition.

name: interim
definition: The time between one event, process, or period and another.

name: entire
definition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete.

name: Pneumothorax
definition: Accumulation of air in the pleural cavity leading to a partially or completely collapsed lung. [https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]

name: inferior vena cava
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: Dolní dutá žíla. Vzniká ze dvou kyčelních žil (vv. iliacae), probíhá vpravo podél aorty a sbírá krev z dolních končetin, pánve, stěny břišní, retroperitonea, jater. (cit. Velký lékařský slovník online, 2019 http://lekarske.slovniky.cz)

name: crosses the lower margin of the image
pneumothorax .
definition: Accumulation of air in the pleural cavity leading to a partially or completely collapsed lung. [https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]

name: intraperitoneal
definition: Relating to the peritoneal cavity as the intended site of administration.

name: recent
definition: Near to or not long before the present.

name: long
definition: Of relatively great or greater than average spatial extension or temporal duration.

name: standing
definition: Human position in which the body is held in an upright orthostatic position and supported only by the feet.

name: Aspiration
definition: Extracción que utiliza presión negativa

name: stool
definition: Excretion in semisolid state processed by the intestine.

name: colon
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: The part of the large intestine measured from the cecum to the rectum consisting of ascending, transverse, descending and sigmoid portions. The purpose of the colon is to remove water from digested food prior to excretion.

name: splenic
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: An organ that is part of the hematopoietic and immune systems. It is composed of the white pulp and the red pulp and is surrounded by a capsule. It is located in the left hypochondriac region. Its functions include lymphocyte production, blood cell storage, and blood cell destruction.

name: flexure
definition: An angular or rounded shape made by folding.

name: vague
definition: A term that refers to something not explicit or clear in meaning.

name: more conspicuous compared with the prior exam
artifact
definition: Cualquier resultado visible de un procedimiento que es causado por el propio procedimiento y no por la entidad que está siendo analizada. Ejemplos comunes incluyen las estructuras histológicas que aparecen durante el procesamiento de tejido, imágenes radiográficas de estructuras que no están naturalmente presentes en tejidos vivos, y productos de reacciones químicas que tienen lugar durante el análisis.

name: Vague
definition: A term that refers to something not explicit or clear in meaning.

name: Port - A - Cath system
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: The anteriorly located rigid section of the PALATE.

name: access
definition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter. Also, an act or means of approaching.

name: Tip
definition: The extreme end of something, especially something pointed.

name: acceleration
definition: 1) Um aumento na taxa de velocidade. 2) Variação da velocidade em função do tempo. Utiliza-se na engenharia sísmica para definir o movimento vibratório do solo ou das estruturas; expressa-se em fração de gravidade (g) (Material II - IDNDR, 1992)

name: concurrent
definition:
A relationship in which the source act's effective time is the same as the target act's effective time.

UsageNote:This code is reflexive. Therefore its inverse code is itself.

name: cancer
definition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. Check for "https://www.cancer.gov/about-cancer/treatment/clinical-trials/intervention/C9305" active clinical trials using this agent. ("http://ncit.nci.nih.gov/ncitbrowser/ConceptReport.jsp?dictionary=NCI%20Thesaurus&code=C9305" NCI Thesaurus)

name: dissemination
definition: To scatter widely; spread.

name: disseminated
definition: To scatter widely; spread.

name: Nearly
definition: Not quite or just short of.

name: complete
definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

name: Similar
definition: The quality of being alike; having characteristics in common.

name: Venous
definition: Of, or pertaining to, or contained in, or performing the function of the veins.

name: Cervical
definition: Relating to a neck, or cervix, in any sense.

name: extremity
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: cardinal body part, each instance of which has as its constitutional part some appendicular skeleton. Examples: There are only four instances, right upper and lower limbs and left upper and lower limbs.

name: atrial
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: The chambers of the heart, to which the BLOOD returns from the circulation.

name: irregular
definition: Lacking perfect symmetry or evenness.

name: breast
semanticTypes: Body Part, Organ, or Organ Component
definition: Region of pectoral part of chest, each instance of which is the modified, glandular structure on some anterior chest and which has as its parts some nipple, areola, breast proper.

name: One
definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.

name: one
definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.

name: detached
definition: Physically separated or not connected.
